name: Logitech Z323 30 W 2.1-Channel Speakers
Features: [360-degree sound: Also known as omnidirectional acoustics, 360-degree sound helps project sound evenly in all directions, giving you a great listening experience throughout the room., Ported, down-firing subwoofer: Delivers rich bass that brings music, movies, and games to life., 30 watts (RMS) of power: Fills the room with big, bold sound., 1 dual RCA jack and a 3.5 mm jack: Let you easily connect a Logitech Squeezebox network music player, DVD player, gaming console, or iPod., Integrated headphone jack: Lets you listen in private whenever you want.]
